trans-unit.source: Specifies the context keyword for a class or member.
This class cannot be inherited.
By default, the Help keyword for a class is given by the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 도움말 키워드 제공한 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: For members, the Help keyword is given by the full name of the type that declared the property, plus the property name itself.
trans-unit.target: 멤버에 대 한 도움말 키워드는 자체 속성 이름과 속성을 선언 하는 형식의 전체 이름으로 제공 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.

The class keyword is "System.Windows.Forms.Button", but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property keyword is "System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text", because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is declared on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> class itself; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> class inherits the property.
trans-unit.target: Class 키워드는 "System.Windows.Forms.Button" 이지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 때문에 속성 키워드는 "System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text"는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에 선언 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control?displayProperty=nameWithType> 클래스 보다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> 클래스 자체 ; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> 클래스 속성을 상속 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is declared on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, so its keyword is "System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult".
trans-unit.target: 반면,는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에 선언 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button?displayProperty=nameWithType> 클래스, 해당 키워드는 "System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult"입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the Help system gets the keywords, it will first look at <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>.
At the class level, it will return the string specified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 클래스 수준에서 지정 된 문자열 반환 됩니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This will not be used for members of the type in question, which will still reflect the declaring type's actual full name, plus the member name.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버 이름을 선언 하는 형식의 실제 전체 이름과 함께 여전히 반영 하는 형식,의 멤버에 대해 사용 되지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This attribute supports strongly typed classes that have associated common documentation but distinct Help IDs.
trans-unit.target: 이 특성 고유한 도움말 id 공용 설명서와 연결 된 강력한 형식의 클래스를 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override this Help system behavior by placing the attribute on the member itself.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 멤버 자체에 특성을 배치 하 여 도움말 시스템 동작을 재정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: These are the keywords for the following class, called `DemoComponent`:
trans-unit.target: 호출 되는 다음 클래스에 대 한 키워드는 `DemoComponent`:

trans-unit.source: Class keyword: "`System.ComponentModel.Component`" (`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent`)
Property1 keyword: "`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent.Property1`" (default)
Property2 keyword: "`SomeNamespace.SomeOtherClass.Property2`" (`DemoNamespace.DemoComponent.Property2`)
The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> class to specify a context keyword.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> 상황에 맞는 키워드를 지정 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제에서는 한 전체 설명은 참조 하십시오. [하는 방법: Windows Forms 컨트롤에서 특성 적용](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-apply-attributes-in-windows-forms-controls.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class.
The Help keyword value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class.
<paramref name="keyword" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The type from which the Help keyword will be taken.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> class from the given type.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 형식에서 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword will be set to the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> property of `t`.
<paramref name="t" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Represents the default value for <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />.
This field is read-only.
The default value for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> is `null`.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />.
Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 인스턴스가 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see langword="true" />가 현재<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />와 같으면 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" /> 이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two instances of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> are equal if their Help keywords are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute> 도움말 키워드가 같은지 하는 경우는 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordAttribute" />.
Gets the Help keyword supplied by this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 이 특성이 제공하는 도움말 키워드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword supplied by this attribute.
Determines whether the Help keyword is <see langword="null" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the Help keyword is <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 도움말 키워드가 <see langword="true" />이면 <see langword="null" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.
